mapper.select: select * from cart where validity > 1 and orderNum in (SELECT orderNum FROM orders WHERE orderDay BETWEEN DATE_ADD(NOW(),INTERVAL -1 MONTH ) AND NOW())

select brandNum, brandName,companyName, managerPhone from brand where brandNum in (select C.brandNum from (select * from orders where orderNum=#{orderNum})O inner join (select * from cart where orderNum=#{orderNum} ) C on C.orderNum = O.orderNum group by brandNum)
mapper.insert: insert into orders(username, itemsPrice, shippingFee, payment) values (#{username}, #{itemsPrice}, #{shippingFee}, #{payment})
